resources.name: Removed Patch from Db
resources.description: Removes a patch from the Cosmos database. Provide the ```resource Group Id``` (or Sandbox Name) and the ```erm Resource Id``` as URL parameters. The request body must include the ```patch Id```.

resources.name: Create Synapse BigData Pool
resources.description:
Create Synapse BigData Pool

Provide the Web Parameters:  ```Resource Group Id```, ```Resource Id```.

body.text:
{
    "@odata.type": "#microsoft.substrate.ai.management.synapseBigDataPoolResource", // Fixed
    "id": "{{ermResourceId}}", // suggestion "synapseBigDataPool0"
    "resourceType": "synapseBigDataPool", // Fixed
    "name": "sparkpool0", // Name must contain only letters and numbers
    "synapseWorkspaceId": "synapseworkspace", // Name of the existing Synapse Workspace on the Sandbox to which create this Big Data Pool
    "minNodeCount": "3", // If a different value than "maxNodeCount", AutoScale will be enabled
    "maxNodeCount": "10", // If a different value than "minNodeCount", AutoScale will be enabled
    "nodeSize": "small", // Possible values are: "small", "medium", "large", "xlarge", "xxlarge", "xxxlarg"
    "sparkVersion": "spark2_4" // Possible values are: "spark2_4", "spark3_1"
}

resources.name: Create Synapse Workspace
resources.description:
Create Synapse Workspace

Provide the Web Parameters:  ```Resource Group Id```, ```Resource Id```.

body.text:
{
    "@odata.type": "#microsoft.substrate.ai.management.synapseWorkspaceResource", // Fixed
    "id": "{{ermResourceId}}", // Lowercase only - suggestion "synapseworkspace"
    "resourceType": "synapseWorkspace", // Fixed
    "name": "swdckr43a6htt3m98", // Less than 17 characters - suggestion "sw" + (random 15 characters)
    "sqlAdministratorLoginPasswordSecretName": "swdckr43a6htt3m98-SqlAdministratorLoginPasswordSecretName", // suggestion (name) + "-SqlAdministratorLoginPasswordSecretName"
    "dataEncryptionKeyName": "swdckr43a6htt3m98-DataEncryptionKeyName", // suggestion (name) + "-DataEncryptionKeyName"
    "managedResourceGroupName": "swdckr43a6htt3m98-ManagedResourceGroup" // suggestion (name) + "-ManagedResourceGroup"
}
